about_the_game:
Skycraft is an open-world survival game for 1-10 players, set in infinite procedurally-generated floating islands.

CONSUME ESSENCE


Possess your spirit to consume the essence of the skies. With each essence, enhance your abilities and expand your island. Embrace the essence and let your spirit soar.

MAINTAIN YOUR ISLAND


Don't let your island run out of essence. Keep gathering essence to enhance astral dimension and expand island. Shape your sanctuary into a thriving haven and defend it from threats.

GATHER RESOURCES


Discover rare resources scattered across islands, crafting essential tools and equipment. Each find shapes your destiny amidst the boundless skies.

BUILD A BASE


Constructing a base to shelter you from dangerous creatures and unforgiving weather. Strengthen defenses against aerial predators and storms. Your sanctuary stands as a beacon of safety in the turbulent skies.

EXPLORE ISLANDS


Embark on expeditions to explore diverse islands, uncovering their hidden secrets and untold treasures. With each step, unravel the mysteries of these uncharted lands and forge your own path amidst the wonders of the skies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: AMD/Intel 4 cores 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Processor: AMD/Intel 4 cores 3.50 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
